Global Inventory¶

Global Inventory Module¶

class riqsolutions.riskiqapi.GlobalInventory(api_token=None, api_key=None, proxy=None, context=None)¶

Represents a request to the Global Inventory API

add_asset(asset_name=None, asset_type=None, asset_name_type_list=None, confirm=False, targetAssetTypes=None)¶

# https://api.riskiq.net/api/globalinventory/#!/default/post_v1_globalinventory_assets_add

Parameters

  • asset_name – type str (requires asset_type)

  • asset_type – type str (requires asset_name)

  • asset_name_type_list – type list - optional ( ex. [{“name”:asset_name,”type”:asset_type}, …] )

  • confirm – type bool (optional - default: False) A boolean value to indicate if the asset state should be CONFIRMED into inventory (confirm: true) or as a CANDIDATE asset in inventory (confirm: false or not specified)

  • targetAssetTypes – type str or type list - A string or array of target asset types to also add to inventory, along with any supplied properties, that are connected to the asset identifiers (e.g. an asset identifier for a PAGE can cascade the properties to all known IPs for that PAGE).

get_asset_deltas(asset_type=None, date=None, delta_range=1, measure='ADDED', brand=None, organization=None, tag=None, size=100)¶

https://api.riskiq.net/api/globalinventory/#!/default/get_v1_globalinventory_deltas

Parameters

  • asset_type – type str, required

  • date – type str, required (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

  • delta_range – type int, optional must be 1, 7, or 30

  • measure – type str, required

  • brand – type str, optional

  • organization – type str, optional

  • tag – type str, optional

  • size – type int, optional

remove_asset(asset_name=None, asset_type=None, asset_name_type_list=None, targetAssetTypes=None)¶

# https://api.riskiq.net/api/globalinventory/#!/default/post_v1_globalinventory_update

Parameters

  • asset_name – type str (requires asset_type)

  • asset_type – type str (requires asset_name)

  • asset_name_type_list – type list - optional ( ex. [{“name”:asset_name,”type”:asset_type}, …] )

  • targetAssetTypes – type str or type list - A string or array of target asset types to also add to inventory, along with any supplied properties, that are connected to the asset identifiers (e.g. an asset identifier for a PAGE can cascade the properties to all known IPs for that PAGE).

update_asset(action=None, asset_name=None, asset_type=None, update_type=None, update_value=None, failOnError=False)¶

# https://api.riskiq.net/api/globalinventory/#!/default/post_v1_globalinventory_update

Parameters

  • action – type str, required (must be add or remove)

  • asset_name – type str, required

  • asset_type – type str, required

  • update_type – type str, required (must be in {0})

  • update_value – type str, required

  • failOnError – type bool, optional
